concept.definition: List choices along the horizontal axis.
List choices down the vertical axis.

description: Direction in which lists of possible answers should be displayed.
name: ChoiceListOrientation

text.div:
ChoiceListOrientation

Direction in which lists of possible answers should be displayed.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/choice-list-orientation defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
horizontal HorizontalList choices along the horizontal axis.
vertical VerticalList choices down the vertical axis.

title: ChoiceListOrientation
